ModMetaData.name: LMC079h.存档界面改进
ModMetaData.author: aRandomKiwi
ModMetaData.description: 汉化：jxb12306 Author jxb12306 FROM 3DM Localization Group 合集链接：http://bbs.3dmgame.com/thread-5842015-1-1.html Save menu improvements. Organize your saves into folders, no more autosave overwriting between colonies in different folders, rename/duplicate saves, mass saves removing... 保存菜单改进。 将您的存档归类到文件夹中，避免不同文件夹中的殖民地之间自动保存被覆盖的问题，重命名/复制存档，批量删除存档… Version 2019 rev2b for Rimworld.
